name: A Countryside named "Sai Gon"
description:
“Taste” the peaceful corner of Sai Gon bustling city, escape to the outskirts of Sai Gon to see how the original Saigoneses enjoy their lives through three kinds of local activities:

1. Work: Incense making rice wine cooking, taking care of the pigs, cows and garden chickens...

2. Eat: Cook a cozy meal with the Grandma and Grandpa and Eat the meal the way Vietnamese does!

3. Play: A ticket to Childhood, have fun with Vietnamese childhood games
